title: If there is no data for the series, a friendly error message should be displayed.
OB: When no data is available for the series, the application does not provide a friendly error message.
EB: When there is no data for the series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR: 1. Open the application. 2. Navigate to the series section where there is no available data. 3. Verify if a friendly error message is displayed.
